channel.title: Comments on: A guide to visiting with the Tana Torajan dead part 2

item.title: By: Amy Burke
item.dc:creator: Amy Burke
item.description: So glad you finally found some time to post some more of your stories Will...you know how much I look forward to reading them! I like how they almost always end up with you drinking beers with a new foreign friend someplace cool. =) Also, I'm glad you are not a water buffalo or an eagle, but our own dear Will Sanders who we are excited to see again very soon! Love you and miss you!
item.content:encoded: So glad you finally found some time to post some more of your stories Will…you know how much I look forward to reading them! I like how they almost always end up with you drinking beers with a new foreign friend someplace cool. =) Also, I’m glad you are not a water buffalo or an eagle, but our own dear Will Sanders who we are excited to see again very soon! Love you and miss you!

item.title: By: Marcus
item.dc:creator: Marcus
item.description:
"Forest Moon, of Endor" or "Forest Moon of Endor".
That spider gives me the willies. (and I'm not talking about the kind where some dude comes over to your house to play records, the wire, eats your brataco's and sleeps on your couch.)
Great post Will, I wish you would have taken a picture with your "biker buddy". Also, isn't it interesting that an eagle showed up during this time? Like the other time you told my about an eagle popping up into your field of view?
item.content:encoded:
“Forest Moon, of Endor” or “Forest Moon of Endor”.

That spider gives me the willies. (and I’m not talking about the kind where some dude comes over to your house to play records, the wire, eats your brataco’s and sleeps on your couch.)

Great post Will, I wish you would have taken a picture with your “biker buddy”. Also, isn’t it interesting that an eagle showed up during this time? Like the other time you told my about an eagle popping up into your field of view?
